name: ecommerse-web-site
description: E-commerce project with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install-all: npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive:true}); fs.cpSync('webapp/dist', 'dist', {recursive:true})"
